name: Kogent Defender (itch)
description:
Kogent Defender enlists you to protect your home world from an encroaching Virtera. Under the command of the Kogent Mind you will take on this alien infestation and work to eliminate it completely.

Modify your load out with left and right guns and your choice of defender unit.

Features

Kogent Defender contains:

  • Twin stick dual weapon wielding action
  • Randomised Extermination levels
  • Boss levels
  • Wave based endless levels 
  • Custom player load outs
